entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sending of Content-Length with TRACE method is not RFC compliant #101357
    Future
  • `Dns.GetHostAddressesAsync` roots diagnostic types even if they are not used or disabled (trimming) #101355
  • Replace deprecated SecTrustGetCertificateAtIndex API in System.Security.Cryptography.Native.Apple #101349
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Recyclable Memory Stream #101348
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #101347
    Future

Closed

  • Clean up CORINFO_HELP_ASSIGN_BYREF for x86/x64 #67707
    9.0.0
  • Perf: JIT sometimes does not elide duplicate checks across inlined methods #69080
    Future
  • GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute can cause error CS0111: Type 'InterfaceImplementation' already defines a member called 'ABI_Blah' with the same parameter types #101242
  • [API Proposal]: Expand GetValueOrDefault in CollectionExtensions to allow IDictionary, not just IReadOnlyDictionary #101311
  • Decompressing GZipStream produces invalid data #101351
  • Misleading error message when referenced assembly is built for different CPU architecture than project #101271
  • Array bounds check is not eliminated if index passed by reference #10649
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Remove Compiler::fgCanonicalizedFirstBB #101358
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Simplify managed MetadataImport creation #101353
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix unnecessary bounds check with ulong index #101352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 124.0.6367.60, windows: 123.0.6312.123 #101345
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Remove some more unnecessary volatile read/write #101346
    area-Meta
  • Avoid unnecessary lazy init in StructuralComparisons #101344
    area-System.Collections
  • Remove more helper frames #100939
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Reduce frozen collection creation overheads for ignore-case with ASCII values #100998
    area-System.Collections

Updated

  • [mono] Interpret static constructors without a runtime invoke wrapper #101324
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refresh cached credentials after PreAuthenticate fails #101053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Test Only] Async interruptions on safepoints with callsite fixups #101341
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr, runtime-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle > 64 registers + predicate registers for Arm64 #98258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add support for Sve.UnzipEven/Odd & Sve.ZipHighLow #101294
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Annotate `config.GetValue()` with `[NotNullIfNotNull]` #101336
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Count*BitElements #101188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [cdac] Read contract descriptor from target #101208
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Bump minimum Apple OS versions #101342
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] More meaningful code in browser template #101287
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Update EOL versions in release/8.0-staging #101073
    Servicing-approved, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • Reapply params ReadOnlySpan overloads without params keyword #101308
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk generated Vue project, open any path is the display of the home page, how not to display the home page when the Vue route does not match #40343

PullRequests

Created

  • Add BeforeMicrosoftNETSdkTargets #40344
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Non deterministic dotnet builds #73161

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove unneeded tests methods #73162
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Run real memory-mapped-file code during tests #73155
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cleanup our temp-storage (memory mapped file) code. #73115
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup5 #73146
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup4 #73145
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup3 #73142
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup2 #73143
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup1 #73144
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer (#68469) #73008
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #55265
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextEmptyFilter #55264
  • Perf improvement: json, json_spring #55263
  • HttpClient doesn't have authentication headers during OnInitialized or OnAfterRender when using global InteractiveAuto rendering #55262
  • Blazor SSR with streaming disabled doesn't await child components #55261
  • Update the qrcode docs for authenticator apps / how to generaten qrcodes for 2fa? #55260
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot #55258
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_spring, plainTextEmptyFilter #55257

Closed

  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #55250
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55234
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55235
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55236
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55237
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55238
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55240
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55239
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #55241
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55242
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #55243
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55245
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55244
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #55246
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55247
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #55248
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicgrpcpublishaot #55249
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #55256
  • Resumable State Machine for Blazor #55232
  • Blazor @onclick not working #55225
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #55233
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #55214

PullRequests

Updated

  • HybridCache - minor post-PR fixes #55251
    area-infrastructure, feature-caching

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android][iOS] Page doesn't function properly when loaded into WebView #21969
  • TitleView causes memory leaks #21968
  • CollectionView causes invalid measurements on Android rotation #21967
  • ViewExtensions.CancelAnimations DOES NOT WORK verified windows android and iOS! #21964
  • Shell.MenuItemTemplate Sometime Does Not Work #21963

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    community ✨
  • IndexOf() stackOverflow fix (#20083) #21965
    community ✨
  • use nameof() where possible #21962
    community ✨

Updated

  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-button
  • Optimize ordering of children in Flex layout #21961
    community ✨
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
